articles.author: Shayna Jacobs, Salvador Rizzo
articles.title: Racketeering was a ‘stretch’ in Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs trial, legal experts say - The Washington Post
articles.description: A federal court jury in the Sean “Diddy” Combs case rejected the government’s theory that he ran a criminal enterprise that helped him carry out serious crimes.
articles.content: NEW YORK A federal court jury in the Sean Diddy Combs case rejected the governments theory that he ran a criminal enterprise that helped him carry out serious crimes including sex trafficking and dru… [+5531 chars]

articles.title: With public ban on band Bob Vylan, Trump appears to ease visa privacy rules to make a point - AP News
articles.description: The U.S. State Department's revelation that it has revoked visas for British punk-rap duo Bob Vylan is the latest indication that the Trump administration appears to have eased privacy restrictions to make public points. Deputy Secretary of State Christopher …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) When the United States revokes someones visa, it is typically confidential, with few exceptions. But with British punk-rap duo Bob Vylan and others, the Trump administration appears t… [+3563 chars]
